page.title: 06A Day In My Life-D.Walshaw.
page.content: Saturday morning 6.00am and the alarm is going none stop.We have had this new alarm for nearly four months now and it never shuts up.Well,not until it has been fed anyway.Charlotte is my baby daughter, she's a beautiful baby.Because I am breastfeeding I can feed her while I'm comfartable in bed. It's seven thirty and I've finished telling the children off for raiding the cupboards and the fridge.While I change the baby my husband makes a welcome cup of tea.Tracy helps Sarah and Alan to get dressed and washed,then we all have breakfast. On Saturday we usually have a morning watching television so after cleaning the nappies and putting them in the washing machine I sit down to feed the baby again watching,No 73 and Captain Scarlet which is my husbands favourite
